comment: If ` B ` follows ` A ` in ` R ` then ` B ` follows ` A ` in the transitive closure of ` R ` . Similar to Proposition 91 of [Frege1879] p. 68. Comparw with ~ frege91 . (Contributed by RP, 15-Jul-2020.)
